page.title: 04THE MANOR NURSING HOME (1)
page.content:
The Manor House was originally built in 1876.As we came down the drive we saw some old machinery.We were told it was used when the Manor was a vicarage.As we entered we could smell disinfectant.We were shown in to a lounge,about eight old people were resting,among them were Professor Kempston, Mrs Hay,Miss Edwards.Then we were shown past Mrs Bell's private room.We say "private" because all the elderly people can bring their own belongings and you have to knock before you enter.Each room has a colour T.V. and a telephone.To complete the luxurious atmosphere, there is a shop trolley and a lending library that is available.
by Richard,Mark & Toby
